httpStatus.name: unauthorized
httpStatus.defaultMessage: You do not have permission to access this API.

httpStatus.name: forbidden
httpStatus.defaultMessage: Access to this API is forbidden.

httpStatus.name: notFound
httpStatus.defaultMessage: The requested API does not exist.

httpStatus.name: gone
httpStatus.defaultMessage: This API is no longer supported.

httpStatus.name: notImplemented
httpStatus.defaultMessage: This API is planned for implementation.
